boardgraphics

Class GraphicsContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • boardgraphics.GraphicsContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GraphicsContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Context for drawing items in the board package to the screen.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz

      • fill_ellipse_arr

        public void fill_ellipse_arr(Ellipse[] p_ellipse_arr,
                             java.awt.Graphics p_g,
                             java.awt.Color p_color,
                             double p_translucency_factor)
        Draws the interiour of an array of ellipses. Ellipses contained in an other ellipse are treated as holes.
        Parameters:
        p_ellipse_arr - an array of Ellipse objects.
        p_g - a Graphics object.
        p_color - a Color object.
        p_translucency_factor - a double.

      • fill_area

        public void fill_area(FloatPoint[][] p_point_lists,
                      java.awt.Graphics p_g,
                      java.awt.Color p_color,
                      double p_translucency_factor)
        Fill the interiour of a list of polygons. Used for example with an area consisting of a border polygon and some holes.
        Parameters:
        p_point_lists - an array of FloatPoint objects.
        p_g - a Graphics object.
        p_color - a Color object.
        p_translucency_factor - a double.

      • set_auto_layer_dim_factor

        public void set_auto_layer_dim_factor(double p_value)
        Sets the factor for automatic layer dimming. Values are between 0 and 1. If 1, there is no automatic layer dimming.
        Parameters:
        p_value - a double.

      • get_auto_layer_dim_factor

        public double get_auto_layer_dim_factor()
        gets the factor for automatic layer dimming
        Returns:
        a double.

      • set_fully_visible_layer

        public void set_fully_visible_layer(int p_layer_no)
        Sets the layer, which will be excluded from automatic layer dimming.
        Parameters:
        p_layer_no - a int.

      • get_layer_visibility

        public double get_layer_visibility(int p_layer_no)
        Gets the visibility factor of the input layer. The result is between 0 and 1. If the result is 0, the layer is invisible, if the result is 1, the layer is fully visible.
        Parameters:
        p_layer_no - a int.
        Returns:
        a double.

      • get_raw_layer_visibility

        public double get_raw_layer_visibility(int p_layer_no)
        Gets the visibility factor of the input layer without the aoutomatic layer dimming.
        Parameters:
        p_layer_no - a int.
        Returns:
        a double.

      • set_layer_visibility

        public void set_layer_visibility(int p_layer_no,
                                 double p_value)
        Gets the visibility factor of the input layer. The value is expected between 0 and 1. If the value is 0, the layer is invisible, if the value is 1, the layer is fully visible.
        Parameters:
        p_layer_no - a int.
        p_value - a double.
